title: Necrophage
data:
{{version031}}
{{monster info}}

==Useful Info==
'''Necrophages''' are grotesque undead. Their melee attacks have a chance of [[drain]]ing your max HP with every hit. They only generate inside certain [[vault]]s.

==Tips & Tricks==
*If you find one in early Dungeon, they can be threatening to [[Alchemist]]s and [[Necromancer]]s, since they are immune to poison/negative energy.
*They're fragile enough that almost anyone can defeat them from a distance with ranged attacks.

==History==
{{CBA|0.32|necrophages will no longer appear in the Dungeon, and they will exist only as [[Yred]] allies. Also, necrophages will have less HP and a weaker melee attack, 8 -> 6.}}
*Prior to [[0.30]], necrophages could spawn in the early [[Dungeon]].
*Prior to [[0.26]], necrophages inflicted [[rot]] instead of draining.
*Prior to [[0.24]], followers of [[Fedhas Madash]] could instantly destroy them with the Fungal Bloom ability.
*Prior to [[0.16]], necrophages could eat corpses to heal.
*Prior to [[0.15]], necrophages could equip weapons and armour.
